page.title: 15OLD DUNDEE GAMES
page.content:
{REELIE FOE}: In this game, two teams play, one team chasing the other. The team which is running away are allowed within a certain boundary. If a member of the running-away team is caught,he is sent to base, which is usually a small area at the top or bottom of a flight of steps. For the person who is caught to be freed, a member of their team must reach the base and shout{ {"Reelie Foe".}The game is over when all the running-away team are caught.
{ CATTY-A-BATTY }: A piece of wood with four sides numbered 1-4 is laid on the edge of a pavement and flicked up into the air with a bat. It is then hit as far as possible. The distance is measured in bats-e.g.20 bats = 20 points. The winner is the player with most points.
